name: PIP Action Campaign
goal: PIP Action Campaign is an international social networking group of women exposed to and affected by banned PIP implants fighting for justice.
interests: Consumers, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
euInitiatives:
Women's Health
Women's Rights
REACH & Chemical regulation of contaminants found in PIP implants
endocrine disruptor chemicals
Medical Devices Regulation
Corruption in the healthcare sector
Regulatory authorities including Notified Bodies & Competent Authorities
Mothers' Health
Breast Implant Cancer
Cosmetic Surgery Interventions
